metadata.dc:author: Jiménez López-Lucendo, N
Martín Dávila, F
Martín García, C
Fernández Durán, A
Fernández Gómez, J
metadata.dc:description: Contribution of one case of epidermoid carcinoma of the urethra in a 47-year old male with a several years old urethral stenosis. The significance of urethroscopy and the obtention of biopsies for diagnosis is emphasised. Also a review is made of the existing literature on the different therapeutical alternatives.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma primario de uretra masculina. Aportación de un caso y revisión de la literatura.
[Primary carcinoma of the male urethra. Report of a case and review of the literature].
